control.description: dirty hack for showing cdart image

control.visible: [Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(58) | Control.IsVisible(59) | Control.IsVisible(55)] + Window.IsActive(musiclibrary) + Player.HasAudio + !Skin.HasSetting(zune_music)
